title: Agnifera
overview: Agnifera is a quirky family drama of two unconventional brides and one helpless groom entangled in a marital quandary. Anurag, a highly qualified MBA graduate from London, is the most eligible bachelor in town and is caught in the cross fire of two marriage proposals. His bridal candidates are the Dabang Dulhans â€“ the daring Ragini who is known for her bandook ki goli and the virtuous Shristi who swears by kanoon ki boli. Both, courageous, brave, and strong-headed ladies wish to become Anurag's wife but who will end up as his bride?
